00028 namespace network {
00029   namespace protocol {
00030     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031     // generic header for any type of data
00032     //
00033     class header {
00034       __attribute__((__packed__));
00035     public:
00036       typedef boost::posix_time::ptime ptime;
00037       typedef boost::posix_time::time_duration time_duration;
00038 
00039       header(std::string     id="01234567",
00040              ptime           approx_ptime=boost::posix_time::not_a_date_time,
00041              boost::uint32_t stream_number=0,
00042              boost::uint32_t length=0)
00043         : approx_ptime_(approx_ptime)
00044         , stream_number_(stream_number)
00045         , length_(length) {
00046         ASSERT_THROW(id.size() == 8);
00047         std::copy(id.begin(), id.end(), id_);
00048       }
00049 
00050       std::string     id()            const { return std::string(id_, id_+8); }
00051       ptime           approx_ptime()  const { return approx_ptime_; }
00052       boost::uint32_t stream_number() const { return stream_number_; }
00053       boost::uint32_t length()        const { return length_; }
00054 
00055       void set_stream_number(boost::uint32_t stream_number) {
00056         stream_number_ = stream_number;
00057       }
00058 
00059       const char* begin() const { return reinterpret_cast<const char*>(this); }
00060       const char* end() const { return reinterpret_cast<const char*>(this) + sizeof(header); }
00061 
00062       friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const header& h) {
00063         return os << "id='" << h.id()
00064                   << "' "<< h.approx_ptime()
00065                   << " stream_number=" << h.stream_number()
00066                   << " len=" << h.length();
00067       }
00068 
00069     protected:
00070     private:
00071       char            id_[8];         // 8-byte identifier         | 8b
00072       ptime           approx_ptime_;  // approximate time tag      | 8b
00073       boost::uint32_t stream_number_; // stream number             | 4b
00074       boost::uint32_t length_;        // length of following data  | 4b
00075       //                                                     total: 24b
00076     } ;
00077 
00078     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079     // header for sampled I/Q data
00080     //
00081     class iq_info {
00082       __attribute__((__packed__));
00083     public:
00084       iq_info(boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz=1,
00085               double          center_frequency_Hz=0.,
00086               char            sample_type='I',
00087               boost::uint8_t  bytes_per_sample=3,
00088               float           offset_ppb=0.,
00089               float           offset_ppb_rms=0.)
00090         :
00091 #if COMP_OLD
00092         sample_rate_Hz_(sample_rate_Hz)
00093         , center_frequency_Hz_(center_frequency_Hz)
00094         , sample_type_(sample_type)
00095         , bytes_per_sample_(bytes_per_sample)
00096         , offset_ppb_(offset_ppb)
00097         , offset_ppb_rms_(offset_ppb_rms)
00098 #else
00099         center_frequency_Hz_(center_frequency_Hz) 
00100         , offset_ppb_(offset_ppb)
00101         , offset_ppb_rms_(offset_ppb_rms)
00102         , sample_rate_Hz_(sample_rate_Hz)
00103         , sample_type_(sample_type)
00104         , bytes_per_sample_(bytes_per_sample)
00105 #endif
00106       {
00107         dummy_[0] = dummy_[1] = 0;
00108       }
00109 
00110       boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz()      const { return sample_rate_Hz_; }
00111       double          center_frequency_Hz() const { return center_frequency_Hz_; }
00112       char            sample_type()         const { return sample_type_; }
00113       boost::uint8_t  bytes_per_sample()    const { return bytes_per_sample_; }
00114       float           offset_ppb()          const { return offset_ppb_; }
00115       float           offset_ppb_rms()      const { return offset_ppb_rms_; }
00116 
00117       const char* begin() const { return reinterpret_cast<const char*>(this); }
00118       const char* end()   const { return begin() + sizeof(iq_info); }
00119 
00120       friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const iq_info& h) {
00121         return os << "sample_rate_Hz="      << h.sample_rate_Hz()
00122                   << " center_frequency_Hz=" << h.center_frequency_Hz()
00123                   << " sample_type='"       << h.sample_type() << "'"
00124                   << " bytes_per_sample="   << int(h.bytes_per_sample())
00125                   << " offset_ppb="         << h.offset_ppb()
00126                   << " offset_ppb_rms="     << h.offset_ppb_rms();
00127       }
00128     protected:
00129     private:
00130 #if COMP_OLD
00131       boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz_;       //  sample rate [Hz]        |  4b
00132       double          center_frequency_Hz_;  //  center frequency [Hz]   |  8b
00133       char            sample_type_;          //                          |  1b
00134       boost::uint8_t  bytes_per_sample_;     //                          |  1b
00135       float           offset_ppb_;           //  deviation from nominal  |  4b
00136       float           offset_ppb_rms_;       //  deviation from nominal  |  4b
00137       boost::int8_t   dummy_[2];             //  for future use          |  2b
00138 #else
00139       double          center_frequency_Hz_;  //  center frequency [Hz]   |  8b
00140       float           offset_ppb_;           //  deviation from nominal  |  4b
00141       float           offset_ppb_rms_;       //  deviation from nominal  |  4b
00142       boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz_;       //  sample rate [Hz]        |  4b
00143       char            sample_type_;          //                          |  1b
00144       boost::uint8_t  bytes_per_sample_;     //                          |  1b
00145       boost::int8_t   dummy_[2];             //  for future use          |  2b
00146 #endif
00147       //                                                            total: 24b
00148     } ;
00149 
00150     class directory_entry {
00151       __attribute__((__packed__));
00152     public:
00153       directory_entry(boost::uint32_t stream_number,
00154                       boost::uint32_t length_of_name)
00155         : stream_number_(stream_number)
00156         , length_of_name_(length_of_name) {}
00157 
00158       boost::uint32_t stream_number() const { return stream_number_; }
00159       boost::uint32_t length_of_name() const { return length_of_name_; }
00160 
00161       static boost::uint32_t name_offset() { return 2*sizeof(boost::uint32_t); }
00162       boost::uint32_t size() const { return name_offset() + length_of_name(); }
00163       const char* begin() const { return reinterpret_cast<const char*>(this); }
00164 
00165       static std::string serialize(boost::uint32_t stream_number, std::string name) {
00166         std::string result;
00167         const directory_entry de(stream_number, name.size());
00168         std::copy(de.begin(), de.begin()+2*sizeof(boost::uint32_t), std::back_inserter(result));
00169         result += name;
00170         return result;
00171       }
00172 
00173     protected:
00174     private:
00175       directory_entry(const directory_entry& );
00176       directory_entry& operator=(const directory_entry& );
00177 
00178       boost::uint32_t stream_number_;   // stream number
00179       boost::uint32_t length_of_name_;  // number of following characters
00180     } ;
00181

00183 } // namespace network
